JobFullDesc: Seeking a Functional Test Engineer to join our growing team!  Are you looking to make an immediate impact where you can help our clients solve their business challenges? Deloitte's Core Business Operations (CBO) portfolio operates at the center of our client's business. By joining our team, you could help C-suite and program leaders transform their organization and accelerate mission execution through emerging and disruptive technologies, innovative business models, retooled program operations and industry-driven solutions. Work you'll do:  Creation and maintenance of a Test Plan document and capturing this information in an approved tool such as Rational Team Concert.  Creation and maintenance of Test Cases for each user story or defect or issue or incident in an approved tool such as Rational Team Concert.  Creation and maintenance of automated regression test scripts for n-1 sprint level regression testing.  Provide test reports for established periodic project tracking meetings and on adhoc basis.  Support Software Quality Assurance process and procedures to build a high-quality application.  Test application compliance with security requirements and identify gaps.  Deliver Enterprise Lifecycle documentation as needed per the project schedule.  Train staff in test scripts, continuous integration or other work areas that contractor has performed, as needed on-site or remotely  Qualifications   Required:  4+ years' experience as a Performance Tester or similar role  4+ years' experience with Manual/ Back-end/API testing through tools like soapUI and RIT  4+ years' experience supporting the SDLC methodology, process and related procedures  Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future Preferred:  Bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, or other technology-related field  Familiarity with IBM Rational products  Cross-mobile/Cross-Browser testing through real mobile devices and Browerstack  Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with experience exercising mature judgment  Proven experience effectively prioritizing workload to meet deadlines and work objectives
